name: Dumbbell Romanian Deadlift (RDL)
cues: Stand with feet hip-width apart, holding dumbbells in front of your thighs, palms facing in
Hinge at your hips, pushing them back with a soft bend in your knees
Lower the dumbbells until you feel a stretch in your hamstrings, keeping your back flat
Pause, then drive your hips forward to stand tall
Keep the dumbbells close to your legs throughout the movement
Focus on feeling the stretch in your hamstrings
